titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning the Epiphany preached at the cathedrall church of Christ in Oxford. By Richard Gardyner, D.D. and canon of the same church.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Richard, 1591-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, and are to be sold by Matth. Hunt,
